author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

The issue fixed at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33866 and discussed in this [Tier-0 Hypernew thread](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/tier0-Ops/2213/1.html) highlighted that the `PCLMetadataWriter` mechanism - which is crucial to dispatch the correct tag names for upload in the Tier-0 PCL workflow -  is currently NOT actively tested in `cmssw` integration tests.
This PR creates a unit test that covers this functionality.
I profit of this PR to perform two very minor bug-fixes:
   * commit cc9852d protects the case in which there is no input histogram to harvest in `SiStripGainsPCLHarvester`
   * commit 0a5f3d1 fixes a typo in `SiStripQualityHotStripIdentifierRoot`.

#### PR validation:

Run the augmented unit tests.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, no backport needed.
title: Introduce AlCaHarvesting / PCLMetadataWriter unit test
